name: lib/Animation.js

types: function(callback: function(time: number): number, element?: HTMLElement)

name: AnimationRule
description: Generic AnimationRule function interface

name: DrawEventCallback
description:
Callback for animation step draw event.
It will be called each time animation step is executed, bypassing
as first argument a percent of animation completeness. It is expected
that this callback will do an actual work of animating an elements or
whatever, as far as animation engine is just calculating and executing
animation steps without any knowledge about things under animation.

name: EndEventCallback
description:
Callback for animation complete event.
It is called once each animation is complete.

name: AnimationRules
description:
Predefined known animation rules.
It's a simple collection of math for some most used animations.

types: {linear: AnimationRule, quad: AnimationRule, dequad: AnimationRule, quint: AnimationRule, dequint: AnimationRule, cycle: AnimationRule, decycle: AnimationRule, bounce: AnimationRule, debounce: AnimationRule, elastic: AnimationRule, delastic: AnimationRule}
type.name: AnimationRules

name: step
description:
Evaluates animation step and decides if the next step required or
stops animation calling a proper events.

name: Animation
description:
Animation engine API for JavaScript-based animations.
This is simply an animation core framework which simplifies creation
of various animations for generic purposes.

name: duration
description:
Overall animation duration in milliseconds.
By default is equal to 250 ms.

name: rule
description:
Animation rule. By default is linear animation.
Animation rule is a subject to animation rules, which are
a simple object containing math-based methods for calculating
animation steps.

name: draw
description: Callback function for the animation step draw event.

name: end
description: Callback for the animation complete event.

name: animate
description:
Performs animation calling each animation step draw callback and
end callback at the end of animation. Callbacks are optional to this
method call. If them are not bypassed will be used that ones which
was pre-set on constructing an Animation object or pre-set after
construction.

name: frame
description: Current requested animation frame identifier

name: cancel
description: Cancels current animation if any

name: destroy
description: Destroys this object properly

name: lib/BaseGauge.js
BaseGauge
description:
Basic abstract BaseGauge class implementing common functionality
for different type of gauges.

It should not be instantiated directly but must be extended by a final
gauge implementation.

name: version
description: Gauges version string

name: type
description: Gauge type class

name: initialized
description: True if gauge has been drawn for the first time, false otherwise.

name: options
description: Gauge options

name: value
description:
Sets new value for this gauge.
If gauge is animated by configuration it will trigger a proper animation.
Upsetting a value triggers gauge redraw.

name: value
description: Returns current value of the gauge

name: configure
description: Updates gauge options

name: update
description: Updates gauge configuration options at runtime and redraws the gauge

name: destroy
description: Performs destruction of this object properly

name: version
description: Returns gauges version string

name: draw
description: Triggering gauge render on a canvas.

name: initialize
description: Inject given gauge object into DOM

name: fromElement
description:
Initializes gauge from a given HTML element
(given element should be valid HTML canvas gauge definition)

name: ensureValue
description: Ensures value is proper number

name: lib/Collection.js
Collection
description:
Gauge collections type.

It is used ES5 declaration here, because babel
transpiles inheritance incorrectly in this case.

name: get
description: Returns gauge object by its identifier or index in the collection

name: lib/DomObserver.js

types: { constructor: function(options: GenericOptions): GaugeInterface, draw: function(): GaugeInterface, destroy: function, update: function(options: GenericOptions) }
type.name: GaugeInterface

name: DomObserver
description:
DOM Observer.
It will observe DOM document for a configured element types and
instantiate associated Types for an existing or newly added DOM elements

name: options
description: Default instantiation options for the given type

name: element
description: Name of an element to lookup/observe

name: type
description: data-type attribute value to lookup

name: Type
description: Actual type constructor to instantiate for each found element

name: mutationsObserved
description: Signals if mutations observer for this type or not

name: isObservable
description:
Flag specifies whenever the browser supports observing
of DOM tree mutations or not

name: isValidNode
description: Checks if given node is valid node to process

name: traverse
description:
Traverse entire current DOM tree and process matching nodes.
Usually it should be called only once on document initialization.

name: observe
description: Observes given mutation records for an elements to process

name: parse
process
description: Processes a given node, instantiating a proper type constructor for it

name: toDashed
description: Transforms camelCase string to dashed string

name: toCamelCase
description: Transforms dashed string to CamelCase representation

name: toAttributeName
description: Transforms camel case property name to dash separated attribute name

name: domReady
description: Cross-browser DOM ready handler

name: lib/EventEmitter.js
EventEmitter
description: Class EventEmitter - base event manager

name: listeners
description: Returns all event listeners

name: emit
description: Emits given event bypassing to each registered handler given args

name: once
description:
Registers given handler for given event to be called only once when
event is emitted

name: on
description:
Registers given handlers for a given events to be called each time event
is emitted

name: off
description: Un-registers previously registered event handlers

name: removeAllListeners
description: Removes all listeners for a given event

name: lib/GenericOptions.js
content:
/*!
 * The MIT License (MIT)
 *
 * Copyright (c) 2016 Mykhailo Stadnyk <mikhus@gmail.com>
 *
 * Permission is hereby granted, free of charge, to any person obtaining a copy
 * of this software and associated documentation files (the "Software"), to deal
 * in the Software without restriction, including without limitation the rights
 * to use, copy, modify, merge, publish, distribute, sublicense, and/or sell
 * copies of the Software, and to permit persons to whom the Software is
 * furnished to do so, subject to the following conditions:
 *
 * The above copyright notice and this permission notice shall be included in
 * all copies or substantial portions of the Software.
 *
 * THE SOFTWARE IS PROVIDED "AS IS", WITHOUT WARRANTY OF ANY KIND, EXPRESS OR
 * IMPLIED, INCLUDING BUT NOT LIMITED TO THE WARRANTIES OF MERCHANTABILITY,
 * FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE AND NONINFRINGEMENT. IN NO EVENT SHALL THE
 * AUTHORS OR COPYRIGHT HOLDERS BE LIABLE FOR ANY CLAIM, DAMAGES OR OTHER
 * LIABILITY, WHETHER IN AN ACTION OF CONTRACT, TORT OR OTHERWISE, ARISING FROM,
 * OUT OF OR IN CONNECTION WITH THE SOFTWARE OR THE USE OR OTHER DEALINGS IN THE
 * SOFTWARE.
 */

/**
 * Describes rendering target element. Can be either string identifier of
 * the element or the element itself.
 *
 * @typedef {HTMLElement|string} RenderTarget
 */

/**
 * Highlight area definition.
 * It describes highlight area starting from value to value using
 * color. Color can be describes with hex, rgb or rgba value.
 *
 * @typedef {{ from: number, to: number, color: string}} Highlight
 */

/**
 * Shared generic gauges options
 *
 * @type {{renderTo: RenderTarget, width: number, height: number, minValue: number, maxValue: number, value: number, units: string|boolean, majorTicks: number[]|string[], exactTicks: boolean, minorTicks: number, strokeTicks: boolean, animatedValue: boolean, animateOnInit: boolean, title: string|boolean, borders: boolean, valueInt: number, valueDec: number, majorTicksInt: number, majorTicksDec: number, animation: boolean, animationDuration: number, animationRule: string|AnimationRule, colorPlate: string, colorPlateEnd: string, colorMajorTicks: string, colorMinorTicks: string, colorTitle: string, colorUnits: string, colorNumbers: string, colorNeedle: string, colorNeedleEnd: string, colorValueText: string, colorValueTextShadow: string, colorBorderShadow: string, colorBorderOuter: string, colorBorderOuterEnd: string, colorBorderMiddle: string, colorBorderMiddleEnd: string, colorBorderInner: string, colorBorderInnerEnd: string, colorValueBoxRect: string, colorValueBoxRectEnd: string, colorValueBoxBackground: string, colorValueBoxShadow: string, colorNeedleShadowUp: string, colorNeedleShadowDown: string, needle: boolean, needleShadow: boolean, needleType: string, needleStart: number, needleEnd: number, needleWidth: number, borderOuterWidth: number, borderMiddleWidth: number, borderInnerWidth: number, borderShadowWidth: number, valueBox: boolean, valueBoxWidth: number, valueBoxStroke: number, valueText: string, valueTextShadow: boolean, valueBoxBorderRadius: number, highlights: Highlight[], highlightsWidth: number, fontNumbers: string, fontTitle: string, fontUnits: string, fontValue: string, fontTitleSize: number, fontValueSize: number, fontUnitsSize: number, fontNumbersSize: number, fontNumbersStyle: string, fontTitleStyle: string, fontUnitsStyle: string, fontValueStyle: string, fontNumbersWeight: string, fontTitleWeight: string, fontUnitsWeight: string, fontValueWeight: string, barWidth: number, barStrokeWidth: number, barProgress: boolean, colorBar: string, colorBarStroke: string, colorBarProgress: string, colorBarShadow: string, barShadow: number}} GenericOptions
 */
const GenericOptions = {
    // basic options
    renderTo: null,
    width: 0,
    height: 0,
    minValue: 0,
    maxValue: 100,
    value: 0,
    units: false,
    exactTicks: false,
    majorTicks: [0, 20, 40, 60, 80, 100],
    minorTicks: 10,
    strokeTicks: true,
    animatedValue: false,
    animateOnInit: false,
    title: false,
    borders: true,
    numbersMargin: 1,

    // number formats
    valueInt: 3,
    valueDec: 2,
    majorTicksInt: 1,
    majorTicksDec: 0,

    // animations
    animation: true,
    animationDuration: 500,
    animationRule: 'cycle',

    // colors
    colorPlate: '#fff',
    colorPlateEnd: '',
    colorMajorTicks: '#444',
    colorMinorTicks: '#666',
    colorTitle: '#888',
    colorUnits: '#888',
    colorNumbers: '#444',
    colorNeedle: 'rgba(240,128,128,1)',
    colorNeedleEnd: 'rgba(255,160,122,.9)',
    colorValueText: '#444',
    colorValueTextShadow: 'rgba(0,0,0,0.3)',
    colorBorderShadow: 'rgba(0,0,0,0.5)',
    colorBorderOuter: '#ddd',
    colorBorderOuterEnd: '#aaa',
    colorBorderMiddle: '#eee',
    colorBorderMiddleEnd: '#f0f0f0',
    colorBorderInner: '#fafafa',
    colorBorderInnerEnd: '#ccc',
    colorValueBoxRect: '#888',
    colorValueBoxRectEnd: '#666',
    colorValueBoxBackground: '#babab2',
    colorValueBoxShadow: 'rgba(0,0,0,1)',
    colorNeedleShadowUp: 'rgba(2,255,255,0.2)',
    colorNeedleShadowDown: 'rgba(188,143,143,0.45)',
    colorBarStroke: '#222',
    colorBar: '#ccc',
    colorBarProgress: '#888',
    colorBarShadow: '#000',

    fontNumbers: 'Arial',
    fontTitle: 'Arial',
    fontUnits: 'Arial',
    fontValue: 'Arial',

    fontNumbersSize: 20,
    fontTitleSize: 24,
    fontUnitsSize: 22,
    fontValueSize: 26,

    fontNumbersStyle: 'normal',
    fontTitleStyle: 'normal',
    fontUnitsStyle: 'normal',
    fontValueStyle: 'normal',

    fontNumbersWeight: 'normal',
    fontTitleWeight: 'normal',
    fontUnitsWeight: 'normal',
    fontValueWeight: 'normal',

    // needle
    needle: true,
    needleShadow: true,
    needleType: 'arrow',
    needleStart: 5,
    needleEnd: 85,
    needleWidth: 4,

    // borders
    borderOuterWidth: 3,
    borderMiddleWidth: 3,
    borderInnerWidth: 3,
    borderShadowWidth: 3,

    // value and highlights
    valueBox: true,
    valueBoxStroke: 5,
    valueBoxWidth: 0,
    valueText: '',
    valueTextShadow: true,
    valueBoxBorderRadius: 2.5,

    // highlights
    highlights: [
        { from: 20, to: 60, color: '#eee' },
        { from: 60, to: 80, color: '#ccc' },
        { from: 80, to: 100, color: '#999' }],
    highlightsWidth: 15,

    // progress bar
    barWidth: 20, // percents
    barStrokeWidth: 0, // pixels
    barProgress: true,
    barShadow: 0
};

export default GenericOptions;

module.exports = GenericOptions;

name: RenderTarget
description:
Describes rendering target element. Can be either string identifier of
the element or the element itself.

name: Highlight
description:
Highlight area definition.
It describes highlight area starting from value to value using
color. Color can be describes with hex, rgb or rgba value.

types: { from: number, to: number, color: string}
type.name: Highlight

name: GenericOptions
description: Shared generic gauges options

types: {renderTo: RenderTarget, width: number, height: number, minValue: number, maxValue: number, value: number, units: string|boolean, majorTicks: number[]|string[], exactTicks: boolean, minorTicks: number, strokeTicks: boolean, animatedValue: boolean, animateOnInit: boolean, title: string|boolean, borders: boolean, valueInt: number, valueDec: number, majorTicksInt: number, majorTicksDec: number, animation: boolean, animationDuration: number, animationRule: string|AnimationRule, colorPlate: string, colorPlateEnd: string, colorMajorTicks: string, colorMinorTicks: string, colorTitle: string, colorUnits: string, colorNumbers: string, colorNeedle: string, colorNeedleEnd: string, colorValueText: string, colorValueTextShadow: string, colorBorderShadow: string, colorBorderOuter: string, colorBorderOuterEnd: string, colorBorderMiddle: string, colorBorderMiddleEnd: string, colorBorderInner: string, colorBorderInnerEnd: string, colorValueBoxRect: string, colorValueBoxRectEnd: string, colorValueBoxBackground: string, colorValueBoxShadow: string, colorNeedleShadowUp: string, colorNeedleShadowDown: string, needle: boolean, needleShadow: boolean, needleType: string, needleStart: number, needleEnd: number, needleWidth: number, borderOuterWidth: number, borderMiddleWidth: number, borderInnerWidth: number, borderShadowWidth: number, valueBox: boolean, valueBoxWidth: number, valueBoxStroke: number, valueText: string, valueTextShadow: boolean, valueBoxBorderRadius: number, highlights: Highlight[], highlightsWidth: number, fontNumbers: string, fontTitle: string, fontUnits: string, fontValue: string, fontTitleSize: number, fontValueSize: number, fontUnitsSize: number, fontNumbersSize: number, fontNumbersStyle: string, fontTitleStyle: string, fontUnitsStyle: string, fontValueStyle: string, fontNumbersWeight: string, fontTitleWeight: string, fontUnitsWeight: string, fontValueWeight: string, barWidth: number, barStrokeWidth: number, barProgress: boolean, colorBar: string, colorBarStroke: string, colorBarProgress: string, colorBarShadow: string, barShadow: number}

name: lib/LinearGauge.js
LinearGaugeOptions
description: Linear gauge configuration options

types: {borderRadius: number, barBeginCircle: number, tickSide: string, needleSide: string, numberSide: string, ticksWidth: number, ticksWidthMinor: number, ticksPadding: number, barLength: number, colorBarEnd: string, colorBarProgressEnd: string}
type.name: LinearGaugeOptions

name: defaultLinearGaugeOptions
description: Default linear gauge configuration options

name: drawRectangle
description: Draws rectangle on a canvas

params.name: r
params.description: radius for founded corner rectangle if 0 or less won't be drawn

params.name: colorStart
params.description: base fill color of the rectangle

name: drawLinearBorder
description: Draws rectangle on a canvas

params.name: r
params.description: radius for founded corner rectangle if 0 or less won't be drawn

params.name: colorStart
params.description: base fill color of the rectangle

name: drawLinearPlate
description: Draws linear gauge plate

name: barDimensions
description: Calculates and returns linear gauge base bar dimensions.

types: {barStrokeWidth: number, barBeginCircle: number, barWidth: number, hasLeft: boolean, hasRight: boolean}
params.name: options

types: {isVertical: boolean, width: number, length: number, barWidth: number, barLength: number, strokeWidth: number, barMargin: number, radius: number, x0: number, y0: number, barOffset: number, titleMargin: number, unitsMargin: number, X: number, Y: number, baseX: number, baseY: number, ticksPadding: number}

name: drawLinearBarShape
description: Draws bar shape from the given options on a given canvas context

name: drawLinearBar
description: Draws gauge bar

params.name: x
params.description: x-coordinate of the top-left corner of the gauge

params.name: y
params.description: y-coordinate of the top-left corner of the gauge

name: hasTicksBar
description: Helper function to calculate bar ticks presence on the sides

name: drawLinearBarProgress
description: Draws gauge bar progress

params.name: x
params.description: x-coordinate of the top-left corner of the gauge

params.name: y
params.description: y-coordinate of the top-left corner of the gauge

name: drawLinearBarHighlights
description: Draws gauge bar highlighted areas

name: drawLinearTick
description: Draws a tick line on a linear gauge

name: drawLinearTicks
description: Draws ticks

name: drawLinearMajorTicks
description: Draws major ticks

name: drawLinearTickStroke
description: Draws ticks stroke

name: drawLinearMinorTicks
description: Draws minor ticks

name: drawLinearMajorTicksNumbers
description: Draws major tick numbers

name: drawLinearTitle
description: Draws linear gauge title

name: drawLinearUnits
description: Draws linear gauge units

name: drawLinearBarNeedle
description: Draws linear gauge needles

name: needleStyle
description: Returns needle color style

name: drawLinearLineNeedle
description: Draws line needle shape

name: drawLinearArrowNeedle
description: Draws arrow needle shape

name: drawLinearValueBox
description: Draws value box for linear gauge

name: LinearGauge
description: Minimalistic HTML5 Canvas Linear Gauge

name: configure
description: Checks and updates gauge options properly

name: draw
description: Triggering linear gauge render on a canvas.

name: drawRadialValueBox

description: Find and return gauge value to display

description: Minimalistic HTML5 Canvas Gauge

name: value

name: lib/SmartCanvas.js
SmartCanvas
description:
Drawings on canvas using hidden canvas as a cache for better
performance drawings during canvas animations. SmartCanvas also
adopts a canvas to

name: width
description: Canvas base width

name: height
description: Canvas base height

name: element
description: Target drawings canvas element

name: init
description: Initializes canvases and contexts

name: elementClone

name: context

description: Canvas caching element 2D context

name: drawHeight
description: Actual drawings height

name: drawY

name: minSide
description: Minimal side length in pixels of the drawing

name: destroy
description: Destroys this object, removing the references from memory

name: onRedraw

name: commit
description: Commits the drawings

name: redraw
description: Redraw this object

name: onRedraw
description: On canvas redraw event callback

name: pixelRatio
description: Returns current device pixel ratio

name: redraw
description: Forces redraw all canvas in the current collection

verifyError

Formats a number for display on the dial's plate using the majorTicksFormat
